message: This offer reflects the initial value before inflation impacts it. I propose we divide the money 4:1 in favor of Bob, considering the future value reduction.
I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor, considering the inflation rates will impact your share more heavily than mine in the future rounds. This ensures a more equitable outcome for both of us.

Considering the inflation rates and aiming for a fair distribution, I propose we divide the money 6:4. This maintains a balance while accounting for the diminishing value of our shares in subsequent rounds.
